15.5. Convolutional Neural Network Model 307
model.add(Dense(1))
model.compile(loss=' mse' , optimizer=' adam' )
Listing 15.33: Example of deÔ¨Åning a CNN model.
The data must be prepared in much the same way as for the MLP. Unlike the MLP that
expects the input data to have the shape [samples, features], the 1D CNN model expects the
data to have the shape [samples, timesteps, features] where features maps onto channels
and in this case 1 for the one variable we measure each month.
